publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7011.1 Charlie Gordon: RSA Investment Boost for Scottish Aviation—As an amendment to motion (S3M-7011) in the name of Bob Doris, insert at end "; notes Glasgow City Marketing Bureau’s commitment of a similar level of resources toward marketing Glasgow city region in the areas served by the new air routes, and considers that this type of air route development, which is compliant with European Union rules on state aid, should be emulated by the Scottish Government." Supported by: Patricia Ferguson*, Cathy Peattie*, Jackie Baillie*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, David Whitton*
S3M-7011.1 RSA Investment Boost for Scottish Aviation (lodged on 20 September 2010) Des McNulty*, Mr Frank McAveety*
